global_caption: a scene featuring a male with short brown hair, around 180 cm, wearing black sunglasses and a black watch on his left wrist, holding a pastel colored big map in his right hand, wearing a short sleeved tight white shirt, beige long pants, and black oxford shoes, looking at the people on the left side; a female with long black hair, 165 cm tall, wearing a pink and blue flower patterned short sleeve shirt, holding a cup of coffee in her left hand, with a silver luggage in front of her, wearing short denim pants and flat slippers, looking to the left; a male with short black hair, wearing a neon green short sleeve shirt and beige knee-length shorts with black sneakers, turning his body slightly to the left, wearing a black and white bracelet on his left wrist; and a woman with medium black hair wearing a sleeveless sky blue dress just below the knee, flat magenta slippers, taking a photo of something above her with her smartphone, holding a straw sun hat in the other hand.
